document.full_text: half of china's 1.34 billion population live in cities and towns, according to a census on thursday that pointed to the daunting tasks ahead for policymakers as the labor market shrinks and the nation grows older.
document.title: china's population grows older and more urban
lines_and_colors: half of china's 1.34 billion population live in cities and towns, according to a census on thursday that pointed to the daunting tasks ahead for policymakers as the labor market shrinks and the nation grows older.
